about_the_game:
Brave New Wonders is a factory automation strategy simulation game with AI automatons. In a post-apocalypse world, you can command automatons with plain English instructions to explore ruins, battle with enemies, construct, automate massive factories and build your amazing wonders.

Command Your Automatons With Text Instructions

Command the automaton army with written English instructions. Backed by a Large Language Model, you can use natural language to tell automatons what to do, and they will follow. Use your imagination to let the automatons collaborate and interact with the environment, sky is not the limit!

Explore Ruins From The Last Civilization

Wander in this post-apocalyptic world, discover ruins from the last civilization, and collect treasures to inspire your people to develop new technologies and create your brave new wonders.

Build A Unique Tech Tree

Hear people’s requests and make decisions. Your decision will affect the branching of your tech tree, it’s different every time for every player.

Unique Features

  • Use customized instructions to command automatons to accomplish tasks.

  • Optimize your factory through intelligent automation with conditional commands.

  • Explore the post-apocalypse world and encounter ruins from the last civilization.

  • Make decisions when receiving requests and build unique tech trees.

About us

City From Naught is an indie game studio based in Toronto. The name comes from our aspiration to build a city in the virtual world out of nowhere - a city that belongs to us and everyone else. We focus on creating immersive gaming experiences since 2019. Brave New Wonders features a novel gameplay. We warmly welcome everyone to join our community for all kinds of discussions.

We hope you enjoy the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 850m 2GB Gddr5
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
